title: KlariVis and Open Finance Leader MX Partner to Serve Financial Institutions With Data-Driven Insights - Yahoo Finance
content: KlariVis and Open Finance Leader MX Partner to Serve Financial Institutions With Data-Driven Insights  Yahoo Finance
description: Powerful data tools and financial insights to deliver additional revenue and growth opportunities with MXdata Featured Image for KlariVis Featured Image for KlariVis ROANOKE, Va., April 28, 2022 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Klarivis, a fast-growing enterprise dashboard and analytics solution for the financial services industry, today announced a new partnership with MX Technologies, Inc., a leader in Open Finance.
